akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title IX, § 955(b), title XXI, § 2193(f), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 592, 828

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 300a–41. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title IX, § 955(b), title XXI, § 2193(f), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 592, 828
Section, Pub. L. 95–626, title VII, § 701, Nov. 10, 1978, 92 Stat. 3601; Pub. L. 96–88, title V, § 509(b), Oct. 17, 1979, 93 Stat. 695, related to improving coordination of Federal and State policies and programs.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealPub. L. 97–35, title IX, § 955(b), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 592, provided that the repeal of this section is effective Oct. 1, 1981. For effective date, savings, and transitional provisions relating to the repeal of this section by section 2193(f) of Pub. L. 97–35, see section 2194 of Pub. L. 97–35, set out as a note under section 701 of this title.
